body.name: ROFALL USB Computer Speakers, PC Speaker with Microphone, 3 Sound Modes, Laptop Speaker with Mic, Hand Free Enhanced Voice Pick up, Compatible with Zoom for Skype, Gaming, Zoom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 secs
features: 📣Universal Compatibility: Computer Speaker fits not only most brands of computer or USB devices, Skype、 Google Hangout、 Facebtime、 Zoom、 odcasts, Twitch, online meetings/teaching, and business/home video calls, etc. Besides, it also works great with all kinds of System: Windows、Chrome OS、Mac OS、Linux etc.

📣3EQ Sound Mode: The USB Computer Speaker provides you with three modes of bass, balance, and vocals, which can be switched by a button. You can choose bass or balance mode for different music style and switch to voice mode for video or online meeting.

📣Noise Canceling Mic for Clear Calls: This USB computer speakers has built in Microphone, that reduces environmental noise and enhances voice pick-up for good clarity during calls. If you are looking for outstanding phone-call performance even for on-line meeting like Skype/Zoom, you can just choose it.

📣Easy to USE: 1. Body size 3.46*3.46*1.3 inch, Weighs only 3.7 ounces. 2. Plug Speaker into Device USB Port. 3. this speaker is small and light enough to easily slip it into your pocket or briefcase and use it anytime, anywhere, true plug and play, no need to download anything, and hassle-free installation.
📣WHAT YOU GET: USB Bluetooth Speaker*1, Type-C Charging Cable*1, Product Manul*1.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB Computer Speakers, PC Speaker with Microphone, 3 Sound Modes, Laptop Speaker with Mic, Hand Free Enhanced Voice Pick up Newest upgraded Computer Speaker with Microphone： 1. 3W driver for enough Loud for a loud sound effect 2. Built in Microphone for hand free Call, Meeting or Online Class 3. 3EQ Mode for Different Sound Effects

Plug and Play As a plug & play USB speakerphone for laptop or PC, eMeet USB conference call speakerphone is optimized for UC experience and can be set-up in second, no driver installation needed. Easy to Use Turn on/off : Long press the multi-functional button for 2s EQ Selection: Press the multi-functional button when the speaker is turned on Volume Control: Simply roll the scroll wheel forwards and backwards Play / Pause Music: Simply press the scroll wheel Portable Size The USB Computer is with Portable Size: 4.13*4.06*1.89Inch, you can take it to anywhere, like Business Trip or Travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s very convenient. I can actual keep my headphone plugged in while using the microphone/speaker during video meetings.I haven’t really used my headphone since I now have the speaker with microphone.It’s not only clear but the high volume sounds clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for what it is
reviews.reviewText: I needed a speaker for my work laptop and this does the trick. I wouldn't listen to music on it but for what I need it for, it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The sound is great but the MIC is BAD
reviews.reviewText: The sound is great but no matter how I adjust the MIC everyone says they can barely hear me and it sounds muffled. I moved it to about a foot away from my face, and still bad feedback. I use this for work instead of a headset, so its important that I am heard in meetings, since I work remotely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars use velcro sticky strips with it.
reviews.reviewText: no volume control or on off button which is nice as you use the pc for that I have accidently turned of things that had their own controls and have had the embarrassment of taking a machine with "sound problems" in for repair only to have the guy turn on the speaker. it was so light weight I put one of those Velcro sticky strips on the bottom of the speaker and the other half on my machine so now it sits out of the way and does not take up any desk space and I can leave it plugged in. I tried taking a photo of it on my machine but as its black and my machine is black you could not see it in the photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars laptop speakers - lousy, no volume control buttons
reviews.reviewText: Seek a better product, not good for meetings and business or school related tasks. No volume control buttons. small, about the size of a hockey puck. Advertised overnight shipping, arrived 2 days later. No worth the trouble. F-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I work from home and this was perfect for my workstation and like daily conference calls. The sound in volume controls make it easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars OK sounding speaker (NOT BLUETOOTH)
reviews.reviewText: ON the description and even on the instructions it mentions this being bluetooth.It is NOT.It doesn't even have an aux input.It is strictly connected via USB.This was a bit confusing and misleading, so I docked some stars for that!It does work OK when it is plugged in via USB.The sound quality is MEH.No "punchy" bass as it claims in the description.I occasionally get some lag when watching videos.You can tell a difference between the 3 preset EQ's, but none are that good.It does seem to be most suited to natural voice and those come through clearly.This serves my purposes, but doesn't impress me. I will use it for now because I have it and it doesn't take up much space.
